Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 307th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit on 6/1/2015, off Byron Serra (DET)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...

Released by San Francisco on 8/9/2016...

Signed as a free agent by New York on 4/16/2018 to a minor league deal...
